name: The First Marathon
description:
The First Marathon, is an Endless Running in which the main character is Philipides, a hero of ancient Greece, who during the Persian invasions had the important mission of being the messenger and traveling throughout Greece until he reached Sparta so that support the Greeks with their troops and thus be able to expel the Persian invader.

Controls:

A  / left arrow : To move left.

D / right arrow : To move right.

Space : To jump.

Escape : To pause the game.

Power-Ups:

 : You become invincible for 3 seconds.

: You collect the coins near you.

: You run faster.

: You run slower
